hero.title: Komita
hero.subtitle: A world of services, A Tunisian world
hero.description: Komita is the concept that connects the Tunisian diaspora in Canada with qualified Tunisian professionals. In a few clicks, access quality services offered by Tunisian experts, while strengthening the links between Canada and Tunisia through a dynamic and innovative network.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.description: To become the main online destination for Tunisians abroad looking for quality professional services, while strengthening ties within the Tunisian community worldwide.

1.text: Offer a platform that connects Tunisian professionals to their diaspora, making services reliable and accessible.

2.text: Provide accessibility for Tunisians living abroad to the services of their professional compatriots.

3.text: Centralize information about Tunisian professionals in a single platform.

4.text: Offer visibility for Tunisian professionals abroad to the Tunisian Community.

1.title: Community
1.description: Strengthen the bonds of the Tunisian diaspora.

2.title: Quality
2.description: A smooth, safe and high-quality experience.

3.title: Connectivity
3.description: Connect Tunisians from around the world with one click.

4.title: Integrity
4.description: Transparency and respect in all our actions.

5.title: Accessibility
5.description: Accessible to everyone, everywhere, without technical limitations.

6.title: Innovation
6.description: Innovate to meet the needs of the community.

forProfessionals.title: Join Our Professional Komita
forProfessionals.description: Join our community of Tunisian professionals and connect with the diaspora. Increase your visibility and grow your business by offering your services on our platform.

aboutSection.title: Explore our universe!
aboutSection.subtitle: Discover what makes Komita a unique platform
aboutSection.description: Komita is the platform that connects the Tunisian diaspora with qualified Tunisian professionals. In a few clicks, access quality services offered by Tunisian experts, while strengthening ties within the community.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions

questions.question: How can I register as a professional?
questions.answer: You can register as a professional by clicking the 'Sign up' button and selecting the 'Professional' role during registration.

questions.question: How can I find a specific service?
questions.answer: Use the search bar at the top of the home page to search for a specific service by keyword and location.

questions.question: Are services verified?
questions.answer: Yes, all professionals go through a verification process to ensure the quality of services offered.

questions.question: How can I contact a professional?
questions.answer: You can contact a professional directly from their service page by clicking the 'Contact' button.

questions.question: Can I leave a review for a service?
questions.answer: Yes, after using a service, you can leave a review and rating to help other users.

questions.question: How do I edit my profile information?
questions.answer: You can edit your profile information by accessing your account and clicking on 'Settings'.
